ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This function conducts the Cochran-Armitage trend test to a 2 by k contingency table. It will report the test statistic (Z) and p-value.A linear trend in the frequencies will be calculated, because the weights (0,1,2) will be used by default.

This function conducts the Cochran-Armitage trend test to a 2 by k contingency table. It will report the test statistic (Z) and p-value.A linear trend in the frequencies will be calculated, because the weights (0,1,2) will be used by default.

name: r-catt
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-catt
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/CATT_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/CATT/CATT_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0f3ab4905f991a93ff7e7345185d63cc3baa8eb584d0ecad0ec5ad17e8d5ad8b

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('CATT')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('CATT')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=CATT
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: This function conducts the Cochran-Armitage trend test to a 2 by k contingency table.
    It will report the test statistic (Z) and p-value.A linear trend in the frequencies
    will be calculated, because the weights (0,1,2) will be used by default.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
